name: Air Fryer Chicken Fajitas
ingredients: 2 chicken breasts, about 1lb, sliced into ¼ inch thick strips
½ teaspoon EACH smoked paprika, cumin, ground coriander, garlic powder, onion powder, salt
Tortillas, sour-cream, avocado, lime slices, fresh cilantro
instructions: Preheat air fryer to 400°F. In a large bowl, add the chicken, bell peppers, onion, and garlic. Drizzle with olive oil and spices and gently mix together until the chicken is fully coated in the spice mixture. Transfer to the preheated air fryer basket and cook for 15 minutes, shaking halfway, or until fully cooked, or until the edges of the vegetables become lightly charred. If your air fryer basket is small, you may need to cook in 2-3 batches. Remove from the air fryer and garnish with cilantro. Serve on tortillas or rice along with avocado, sour cream or guacamole.
